lines.string: Oh god, I' so relieved to see someone else here... Would you lend me a hand? I came here a few days ago, but I got lost and those monsters won't let me go...
Would you mind... you know... slaughtering as many as them as you can? With five of those creeps down I should be able to escape this living hell.
Kill five of those monsters that live around here please, that's all I ask for... May you have luck in your quest...
You really are my saviour! Now I can finally escape this place.
H-hey, did you hear that? It sounded like rocks breaking to pieces.
You should go investigate the path that used to be blocked by rocks, I think you may be able to go over there now.
